petNameAdd:
1) State of Assam
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Mongla Tudu @ Marang Tudu is present. Judgment ready and delivered in open court. prosecution totally failed to bring home charge u/s 448/323 I.P.C r/w section 4 of POCSO Act against the accused person Mongla Tudu @ Marang Tudu . Accordingly he is acquitted from the charge of section u/s 448/323 I.P.C r/w section 4 of POCSO Act and is set at liberty.His bail bond shall remain stand for next 6 months u/s 437(A) Cr.P.C.Case is disposed of on contest.
